 Bitmap ()

Detailed Description

The Bitmap class is an image where the pixels data can be modified (plotted.)

AggOO::Bitmap::Bitmap ( const CHAR *  filename,
BOOL  useIcm = FALSE 
)

GDI+ does not have image loading with regular ascii strings, but DevIL uses them to load images, so why not provide handlers for them directly?

Parameters:
filename Path to the file to load
useIcm (Currently unused in AggOO. Default is FALSE.)
